q1.questionText: Which of the following can be used to make the following array sum to 15: [1, 2, 3, 4]

q2.questionText: What is the purpose of an index in an array?
questionOptions: To access and identify each part in the array
To set the size of an array
To perform mathematical operations on the array
questionAnswer: To access and identify each part in the array

q4.questionText: Given the array arr = [8, 7, 6, 5], which of the following equates to 10

q6.questionText: Which of the following can be used to instantiate an array?
